refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads any number of bits from a memory buffer

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GstBitReader provides a bit reader that can read any number of bits from a memory buffer. It provides functions for reading any number of bits into 8, 16, 32 and 64 bit variables.

refsect2.title: GST_BIT_READER_INIT()
refsect2.para: A GstBitReader must be initialized with this macro, before it can be used. This macro can used be to initialize a variable, but it cannot be assigned to a variable. In that case you have to use gst_bit_reader_init().

entry.para: Data from which the GstBitReader should read

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_new ()
refsect2.para: Create a new GstBitReader instance, which will read from data .
Free-function: gst_bit_reader_free

entry.para: Data from which the GstBitReader should read.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new GstBitReader instance.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_free ()
refsect2.para: Frees a GstBitReader instance, which was previously allocated by gst_bit_reader_new().

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_init ()
refsect2.para: Initializes a GstBitReader instance to read from data . This function can be called on already initialized instances.

entry.para: data from which the bit reader should read.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_pos ()
refsect2.para: Returns the current position of a GstBitReader instance in bits.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The current position of reader in bits.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_remaining ()
refsect2.para: Returns the remaining number of bits of a GstBitReader instance.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The remaining number of bits of reader instance.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_set_pos ()
refsect2.para: Sets the new position of a GstBitReader instance to pos in bits.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the position could be set successfully, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_size ()
refsect2.para: Returns the total number of bits of a GstBitReader instance.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The total number of bits of reader instance.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_skip ()
refsect2.para: Skips nbits bits of the GstBitReader instance.

entry.para: the number of bits to skip

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if nbits bits could be skipped, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_skip_to_byte ()
refsect2.para: Skips until the next byte.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_bits_uint16 ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val and update the current position.

entry.para: Pointer to a guint16 to store the result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_bits_uint32 ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val and update the current position.

entry.para: Pointer to a guint32 to store the result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_bits_uint64 ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val and update the current position.

entry.para: Pointer to a guint64 to store the result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_bits_uint8 ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val and update the current position.

entry.para: Pointer to a guint8 to store the result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint16 ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint16 (const GstBitReader *reader, guint16 *val, guint nbits);
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val but keep the current position.

entry.para: Pointer to a guint16 to store the result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint32 ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint32 (const GstBitReader *reader, guint32 *val, guint nbits);
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val but keep the current position.

entry.para: Pointer to a guint32 to store the result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint64 ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint64 (const GstBitReader *reader, guint64 *val, guint nbits);
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val but keep the current position.

entry.para: Pointer to a guint64 to store the result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint8 ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint8 (const GstBitReader *reader, guint8 *val, guint nbits);
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val but keep the current position.

entry.para: Pointer to a guint8 to store the result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_skip_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Skips nbits bits of the GstBitReader instance without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader.

entry.para: the number of bits to skip

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_skip_to_byte_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Skips until the next byte without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_bits_uint16_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val and update the current position without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: unsigned 16 bit integer with the bits.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_bits_uint32_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val and update the current position without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: unsigned 32 bit integer with the bits.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_bits_uint64_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val and update the current position without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: unsigned 64 bit integer with the bits.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_get_bits_uint8_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val and update the current position without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: unsigned 8 bit integer with the bits.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint16_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val but keep the current position without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: unsigned 16 bit integer with the bits.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint32_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val but keep the current position without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: unsigned 32 bit integer with the bits.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint64_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val but keep the current position without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: unsigned 64 bit integer with the bits.

refsect2.title: gst_bit_reader_peek_bits_uint8_unchecked ()
refsect2.para: Read nbits bits into val but keep the current position without checking if there are enough bits available in the bit reader

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: unsigned 8 bit integer with the bits.

refsect2.title: GstBitReader
refsect2.para: A bit reader instance.

entry.para: Data from which the bit reader will read.
Bit position in the current byte
